# showsCloseButton

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether a close button should be shown on the popover bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var showsCloseButton: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], a close button is automatically displayed when the popover bar is displayed. When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], it is your responsibility to dismiss the popover bar.

## Configuring the expanded popover

- **popoverTouchBar**: The bar displayed when this item is “popped.”
- **pressAndHoldTouchBar**: The bar that is displayed when a user press-and-holds on the popover item.
